alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued June 15 at 1:19PM PDT until June 16 at 2:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor tidal overflow of beaches and exposed parking lots around the time of high tide. * WHERE...Malibu Coast and Los Angeles County Beaches. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Pooling of sea water is possible around high tide at beach and harbor areas that is uncommon with normal tidal ranges. Enhanced beach erosion is also possible. No significant damage is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A high tide of 7.2 to 7.4 feet will occur this evening around 1030 pm PDT.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water due to hazardous swimming conditions, or stay near occupied lifeguard towers. Stay off rock jetties, as they can be deadly locations in such conditions.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast
